text: Codonanthe elegans is a plant species in the genus Codonanthe. It is found in Belize. == References == * Balick, M. J., M. H. Nee & D.E. Atha. 2000. Checklist of the vascular plants of Belize. Mem. New York Bot. Gard. 85: i–ix, 1–246 == External links == Category:Gesneriaceae Category:Plants described in 1984 Category:Flora of Belize
title: Codonanthe elegans
